objects.text:
✧ 925 Sterling Silver
✧ Perfect Gift for Her
✧ Timeless Elegance
✧ Certificate of Authenticity

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a luxurious, feminine design tailored for premium jewelry promotion. The background splits diagonally between rich rose and soft pink gradients, embellished subtly with twinkling light motifs. The layout includes a large, bold headline (`heading`) in a serif font at the top left, followed by an elegant subheading (`subheading`) in a more delicate serif style. Beneath it, a neat list of feature descriptions (`description`) in smaller white text communicates the product's key selling points. A prominent price tag (`price`) anchors the lower section, alongside a rectangular pink call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with contrasting text (`cta`) urging immediate purchase. A soft-script tagline (`tagline`) adds a sentimental touch. On the right side, a high-quality product image (`product_image`) showcases rose gold stud earrings, balancing the visual weight of the banner.

**Color Palette:**
- Rich Maroon #8E2D5A
- Pink Rose #A13C6A
- Soft Blush #F8C3D8
- Pastel Pink #FFD1E1
- Cream White #FFE4E1
- Solid White #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings predominantly featuring soft rose gold (#F4A6A6) and crystal white (#FFFFFF) tones. The rose gold forms the base structure, lending a warm, luxurious feel, while the brilliant white gemstones add shimmer and highlight the intricate design. The teardrop-shaped pink element uses a gradient blush pink (#FBB6B6 to #FDA3A3), subtly blended to create depth and visual interest. Sparkling faceted stones reflect light for glamor and brilliance, enhancing the contrast with the rose-toned frame. This palette suggests sophistication and femininity, perfect for beauty or luxury-themed advertisements.
